title: Royal Scandal
original_name: ロイヤル・スキャンダル
sinopse:
In the Royal Scandal series:

1. Yumemiru Princess [Story: Carrie Alexander, Art: Isesaki Towa]
2. Princess Kyousoukyoku (A Royal Mess) [Story: Jill Shalvis, Art: Momoka Minori]
3. Princess ni Muchuu (A Noble Pursuit) [Story: Meg Lacey, Art: Orihara Mito]
4. Watashi no Eranda Prince (A Prince of a Guy) [Story: Jill Shalvis, Art: Hidaka Nanao]
5. Princess no Negai (Her Knight to Remember) [Story: Jill Shalvis, Art: Kurebayashi Tsukiko]
